name: Necromancer
text:
Whenever you kill an enemy, you may resurrect it as a zombie. It gains an amount of HP equal to the amount of damage dealt to it to kill it, minus its HP just before dying. Zombies cannot regain HP.
Whenever you perform a Move action, each of your zombies may move up to 3 spaces.

You gain the Zombie Attack ability:
Cost: 1 AP.
Each of your zombies may make a natural attack against a character near it. Roll a die; on a 5 or higher, the zombie's attack deals damage equal to the die's value.
